meanings.definition: A place where men can get their hair cut and groomed.
meanings.sent1: I went to the barbershop for a haircut.
meanings.sent2: The barbershop down the street is always busy on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The barbershop was so full, it looked like a party in there!
meanings.sent4: His messy hair was like a jungle until he visited the barbershop.
meanings.sent5: The smell of aftershave in the barbershop lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A style of unaccompanied vocal music characterized by close four-part harmonies.
meanings.sent1: They sang beautiful barbershop music at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The barbershop quartet harmonized perfectly together.
meanings.sent3: The barbershop music made everyone tap their feet.
meanings.sent4: Her voice blended with the others like a barbershop harmony.
meanings.sent5: The barbershop melodies echoed through the auditorium.
